method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _additem
method.comment: Adds an item to the menu. ItemImage - the image shown as the MenuItem

method.name: _initialize
method.comment:
Initializes the object.
Parameters: Activity - The activity to add the OrbitalMenu to. Use 'Activity' to pass the current activity. Module - Use 'Me' EventName - The EventName to be use for callbacks. _AnimationEnd(Open as Boolean) - this event triggers once the menu has finished expanding or collapsing. Open - will return whether the menu is open or not. _Click(Position as Int) _LongClick(Position as Int) Position - returns the Item Position that triggered the event. First Item = 1. StaticButtonImage - A static background for the menu button. Use NULL for no image. AnimatedButtonImage - A bitmap that will show in front of the StaticBackgroundImage and will rotate 90 degrees when pressed. Use NULL for no image. x, y - The coordinates for where the button will appear.

method.name: _setanimatedbuttondimensions
method.comment: Use to override the dimensions of the AnimatedButtonImage Defaults are 20dip x 20dip

method.name: _setdegreespan
method.comment: Sets the amount of degrees the MenuItems Orbit will span from the starting point. Default is 90

method.name: _setmenuitemdimensions
method.comment: NOTE: Must be called before Adding and items to the menu. Use to override the dimensions of the menu items. Defaults are 40dip x 40dip

method.name: _setmenuitemradius
method.comment: Use to set the Menu item radius (the distance the items pop out from center) Default is 120dip

method.name: _setstartdegrees
method.comment: Sets the angle the MenuItems Orbit will start at. Default is 0 (straight up.)

method.name: _setstaticbuttondimensions
method.comment: Use to override the dimensions of the StaticButtonImage Defaults are 20dip x 20dip

method.name: _toggle
method.comment: Simulates a Click of the menu Button
